author: oalexeev
msg: Add russian string resources for struts example application.

author: craigmcc
msg: Add Japanese translations of the application resources for the Struts
Example application.  In addition, set the character set for the example
JSP pages to "UTF-8" so that it can display either English or Japanese.
Submitted by:	Yoshinori Ashizawa and Yukimitsu Kurozumi

author: dwinterfeldt
msg: There was a bug reported (out of memory exception) when loading many forms calling the toString mehtod on FormSet.  I've changed all toString methods to use StringBuffer.  This should help with unessecary object creation.

author: husted
msg: Refactor DispatchAction so that it can be more easily subclassed.
can dispatch to a method by looking up the message key
for the button's label, so that multiple submit buttons can share

author: martinc
msg: Update the release notes for Struts 1.0.1 to refer to the release candidate
and to point to the appropriate downloads.
